name: Effect of writ
text: Whenever a writ is issued for the removal of any tenant, the contract for the use of the premises, if any exists, and the relation of landlord and tenant between the parties, shall be deemed to be canceled and annulled. [CC 1859, §945; RL 1925, §2786; RL 1935, §4023; RL 1945, §10412; RL 1955, §240-13; HRS ]
